active_skill.name: Maximum Voltage!
active_skill.description:
Charges the enemy and continuously electrocutes the target, dealing Electric DMG and accumulating Electric Anomaly Buildup.

DMG Multiplier: 684%

Daze Multiplier: 400%

Cooldown 18s

additional_ability.name: Inductive Current
additional_ability.description: When there are at least 2 Electric Attribute charactersin your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack inflicts 120% more Anomaly Buildup.

chain_attack.name: Billion Volt Thunderbolt!
chain_attack.description:
Continually electrocutes the target, dealing Electric DMG and inflicting Electric Anomaly Buildup.

DMG Multiplier: 1352%

Daze Multiplier: 193%
